Game: Bonk 3- Bonk's Big Adventure 1993-04-02T00:00:00-07:00 Bonk's Big Adventure is the third instalment in the side-scrolling platformer series. As in previous games, the player assumes the role of a caveman named Bonk who headbutts his way through various enemies in order to defeat King Drool. Familiar moves include swinging on trees, bouncing off walls, breaking blocks and climbing walls with his teeth. Compared to the previous games, he walks and moves a little faster. 1 IOqSoynT1ns <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/63d18743-d0be-4550-9748-a1aea7c9c71c.png</1> <2>http://images.launchbox-app.com/18bfd6fc-d499-489c-813e-ca3ab4afc973.png</2> http://images.launchbox-app.com/44ec3c7b-7564-467e-ba86-71dfe816062e.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/6b9f88a6-cd88-4238-9d7f-695e4d807b36.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/52702bf3-3d82-44e9-b4af-f788bf91a7bd.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/d4d4f917-02b5-4beb-b2f7-c1576acfd9a0.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/aeb54c19-9c8d-4bbc-a8dd-2b386b4c30d5.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/882a2a67-cc39-46b3-beb1-54cef0ee6c5c.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/15f41f5f-1310-4bca-8794-030bb97f938a.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/5fd17d6e-3101-4abd-9b84-89fcfb50019e.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/ba9f72f9-7a0b-49a8-888f-1ffae405d86c.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/68ea3a4a-b6d1-4e1b-b9af-4007bdf56446.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/852f9772-2a0c-44e9-b144-5b2eea721fc4.jpg 2 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonk_3:_Bonk%27s_Big_Adventure Not Rated Platform A.I NEC
